citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Pour-on ivermectin had an expiration date of 8/2023 and had likely been used on some litters in September 2023. The
use of expired medication might not be as effective. Ensure expired medications are not stored and not used in regulated
animals.
***Correct by 10-19-2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Pour-on ivermectin had an expiration date of 8/2023 and had likely been used on some litters in September 2023. The 
use of expired medication might not be as effective. Ensure expired medications are not stored and not used in regulated 
animals.  
***Correct by 10-19-2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
